gOqShThE ri#rIhi || 
praqjApa#tiqrmahya#mEqtA rarA#NOq viSvai$rdEqvaiH piqtRuBi#H saM~MvidAqnaH | 
SiqvAH saqtIrupa# nO gOqShThamA&kaqstAsA$M ~MvaqyaM praqjayAq sa(gm) sa#dEma ||
iqha dhRutiqH svAhEqha vidhRu#tiqH svAhEqha rantiqH svAhEqha rama#tiqH svAhA# 
maqhImUq Shu1 suqtrAmA#NaM2 || 44 
(iqndrAq - ShTAtri(gm)#Sacca) (A17)
